meta.purpose: Prompts Stable Diffusion pour toutes les cartes AVALON TCG
meta.style_base: epic fantasy trading card game art, highly detailed digital painting, professional TCG illustration style, dramatic lighting, vibrant colors

style_presets.hero: legendary hero portrait, epic fantasy character art, detailed armor and weapons, heroic pose, magical aura
style_presets.creature: fantasy creature illustration, detailed anatomy, mystical environment, creature design
style_presets.spell: magical spell effect visualization, energy particles, mystical symbols, spell casting
style_presets.artifact: magical artifact item, ancient relic, glowing enchantments, mystical object
style_presets.terrain: fantasy location landscape, magical environment, atmospheric lighting
style_presets.event: dramatic scene illustration, multiple characters, action sequence, epic moment

negative_prompts.avoid: blurry, low quality, amateur art, simple cartoon, childish, poorly detailed, bad anatomy, text overlays, watermarks, signatures, modern clothing unless specified, realistic photography, low resolution
negative_prompts.style_avoid: anime, manga, chibi, minimalist, abstract, geometric, photorealistic portrait, modern day setting unless specified

usage_instructions.format: Copy the 'prompt' field directly into Stable Diffusion
usage_instructions.style_mixing: Combine base prompt + style_preset for variations
usage_instructions.customization: Add specific details before 'epic fantasy trading card game art'
usage_instructions.consistency: Use same seed for character variations
usage_instructions.post_processing: Add card frame and stats overlay after generation
